instructions: Go to Settings , and then tap Apps or App Manager . Find and tap the app that is experiencing the issue. Tap Clear data or Storage > Clear data . Tap OK to confirm.

Open the Play Store app. Tap Drawer button In the Installed tab, available updates for installed apps will be displayed. Tap Update all to update all installed apps. To update specific apps individually, tap the app and select Update .
Go to Settings . Tap About > Software updates or Software updates . Tap Check now .

Go to Settings , and then tap Apps or App Manager . Select the app that is experiencing the issue. Select Uninstall for apps downloaded from the Play Store app or Uninstall updates for preinstalled apps. Select OK to confirm the selection. Install the app or update again via the Play Store app.
